overview:
Vice President of Engineering at Amobee.

Gil has more than 15 years of product development leadership and innovation experience. Previously, Gil served as the Director of Engineering at A9.com (a fully owned subsidiary of Amazon.com). Gil led the Ad Technologies engineering group, developing advanced online advertising platforms for some of the world’s largest websites, including Amazon.com and other prime online properties. Formerly, Gil successfully led the development of several key initiatives at Cisco in the areas of QoS and MPLS management for both the Enterprise and the Service Provider markets. Gil is the author of several patents in network management and online advertising
